metadata.Title: CVE-2019-8357 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in SoX 14.4.2. lsx_make_lpf in effect_i_dsp.c allows a NULL pointer dereference. It was discovered that SoX incorrectly handled certain MP3 files. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service. (CVE-2019-8354, CVE-2019-8355, CVE-2019-8356, CVE-2019-8357)

criterions.comment: sox package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '14.4.2+git20190427-1').
